item.title: JavaScript 101
item.description: JavaScript basics. This post is part of the course material for [ENSF 381 (W23)](https://contacts.ucalgary.ca/info/enel/courses/w23/ENSF381?destination=courses%2Fw23) at the University of Calgary.
